content.rendered:
The ‘Suzuki Diagnostic System Mobile’ app can be linked to your outboard motor via a multifunctional screen or smaller gauge.

How does it work?

  1. The outboard motor sends the data via a generated QR code to the multifunctional screen or smaller gauge;
  2. With the SDSM app you can scan this QR code and get the data on your smartphone;
  3. You can then e-mail this data to a Suzuki Dealer so that they have a complete overview of your sailing data and in this way – if necessary – can more easily solve the problem.
